short_summary: Stock replenishment of Automatic Inflation devices
description: Please see full notice for details
full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement
Stock Replenishment of Automatic Inflation Devices FLU9-B/P
** PW-22-01012489 **

**Tender Details**

* Solicitation Number: W8485-226618/A
* Publication Date: 2022-11-04
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-12-02T14:00:00
* Amendment Number: 1
* Amendment Date: 2022-11-10

**Contract Description**
The Department of National Defence invites bids for the stock replenishment of automatic inflation devices FLU9-B/P.

* Estimated commodity quantity: $274,320
* Contract duration: November 4, 2022 - March 31, 2023
* Delivery schedule: January 30, 2023 - February 28, 2023
* Delivery location: To be disclosed upon contract award by February 15, 2023

**Participation Requirements**

* The tender Notice falls within the bounds of the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA). Bidders must include the following requirements in their description:
	+ Estimated commodity quantity
	+ Contract duration
	+ Delivery schedule
* Notice of Proposed Procurement
* Due to the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic, reduced business hours, and limited staff available at the specified bid receiving unit, bidders are strongly encouraged to transmit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service.

**Trade Agreements**
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Tender Documents**
Tender documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. The tender documents can be accessed at:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/04/f9a159a01a3d4603c9c2deb8a18c7f30/w8485-226618a_bid_solicitation_en.pdf (English)
https://canadabu
